typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		{Rotton Tomato} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Csv
Csv split(year > 1950,
	year < 1950,
	disjoint: false) ~> DifferenceYears@(Before1950, After)
DifferenceYears@After split(year > 1925,
	year < 1925,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Before25, After25)
DifferenceYears@Before1950 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@Before25 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@After25 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink3
